article.title: ZeroNet Development Resources
article.text:
==Table of Contents== * [#doces-references Docs \& References] * [#tutorials-learning-resources Tutorials \& Learning Resources] * [#tools-dev-services Tools \& Dev Services] * [#devs-opensource-projects Devs \& Opensource Projects] * [#coffeescript Coffeescript] * [#vue-js Vue.js] * [#other-js-frontend-unconfirmed Other js frontend \& unconfirmed] * [#backend-python-etc- Backend - python, etc.]
==Docs \& References== * [https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ ZeroNet Documentation] [https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/Documentation/ ZeroNet Documentation Github repo] [zero://1Docsfk5uLvuXkL4U13eYDxCm2gzi1fNQq/ Unofficial clone of Documentation on ZeroNet] #outdated ==Tutorials \& Learning Resources== * [zero://Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new ZeroChat tutorial new] #official #javascript * [zero://Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:46:ZeroNet+site+development+tutorial+2 ZeroChat tutorial old] #official #coffeescript * [zero://1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/ Zeronet Tutorials] #zerowiki #multisource * [https://github.com/krixano/ZeroNet-Dev-Center/issues/28 The Truth about ZeroNet] Tutorials and zite examples written by imachug (gitcenter@zeroid.bit), including 13 chapters from understanding basic ZeroNet components to advanced topics like merger sites and merged content. Great starting point for new developers. * [zero://14pM9huTYzJdyQyHRj6v2kfhMe8DrxwpGt/?/tutorials Tutorials on ZeroNet Dev Center] * [zero://1KtzUsnmwc1Wr7KWWEGnWzmBSQoyH917Pz Kopi] Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again. * [https://www.npmjs.com/package/zeroframe Zeroframe on NPM] * [https://github.com/anoadragon453/ZeroNetTemplate ZeroNetTemplate] Site template for making ZeroNet sites with modern web technologies * [https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react Zeronet/React example site] Get started creating a zeronet site using react. Need to be updated. * [zero://udemy.acabin.bit Udemy Courses] This zite provides magnet URI's for a bunch of udemy courses. Every torrent includes: all videos, all subtitles and all course files. * [https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome Github Awesome Meta List] Just awesome ;) ==Tools \& Dev Services== * [zero://1F6Rt2QNMA6uJTSTZkDNBfXTd3unrtgcdJ/ Mavo] #official #experimental ZeroNet storage plugin for Mavo that allows any web application created for this platform to run in a P2P and decentralized way without any modification. [[ref]](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:113:ZeroNet+backed+for+Mavo) * [zero://0git.bit/ 0git] Git repositories hosted on ZeroNet * [zero://1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/ CodeR] JSFiddle and CodePen alternative * [zero://1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/ Git Center] Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. Provides several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories. * [zero://1xxooZ7s8iDz3u56i5mNQ1XGmwF8Zvnw9/ Git over ZeroNet] * [zero://stagit.0git.bit/ Static git repository page generator] * [zero://1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/ NullPaste] #pastebin * [zero://ZeroDB.bit/ ZeroDB] #database #WIP Visual editor to create Dbschema files. * [zero://1K2myjtjoEVpRC2JMieRL73ES4V4iLP2Ev/?/ ZeroFrame Router] #vue.js A very basic router that works with the ZeroFrame API. * [zero://1JKPBG3dLp9FARyarPoR3Mv3p5d9Fy9Em1 zeronet-websocket] Nodejs websocket wrapper for ZeroFrame API * [https://github.com/imachug/ZeroNet-cmd-lib ZeroNet-cmd-lib] Python websocket wrapper for ZeroFrame API, command-line tools for ZeroNet and some ZeroNet sites. * [https://github.com/imachug/ZeroDevLib ZeroDevLib] Libraries for ZeroNet site development ==Devs \& Opensource Projects== ===Coffeescript=== * [https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ HelloZeroNet] (Nofish) * Repos of all ZeroNet official zites [[Gitlab repo]](https://gitlab.com/HelloZeroNet/) * ZeroNet (src/Ui/media) [[Git Center repo]](/1P4w4Rvh4vS9r6G5xTiSh8qEW87EKZtnJB/) * affeali * [zero://1BeUcctgazL9DkHgPD8zFpCNggqjEEfjRu ZeroWikiImproved] Experimental improved ZeroWiki with history-diff feature. * binchan2 * [zero://1M5dciFFSWt4wKs9Nnxa34BgGnt7os7h3v ZeroBlog Plus] Enhanced ZeroBlog including TOC, tag, mobile, etc. * [https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroMe/pull/100/ ZeroMe Mobile] Hub feed timeline, language character filter and chronological timeline * [zero://1DjFq5aHgM7vRZqP3mB4dWH8RAh6us8nHb Binchan's 0-Share] Yet another enhanced ZeroUp clone * Emeraude * [https://github.com/Emeraude/ZeroMusic ZeroMusic] * [https://github.com/ZeroNerds ZeroNerds] * ZeroMeReloaded Enhanced ZeroMe * HelloZeroProxy Enhanced ZeroHello for clearnet proxy * [https://github.com/ZeroNetLabs ZeroNetLabs] * ZeroWiki * kopi Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again. ===Vue.js=== * [https://github.com/anoadragon453 anoadragon453] * ZeroLSTN [[Git Center repo]](/1Code5125iycoEFCMi9a4XVejFwauoyGqj/) ZeroNet Music Streaming Site * ZeroNetTemplate * imachug (gitcenter) * [https://github.com/imachug/Kiwipedia Kiwipedia] [[Git Center repo]](/13c2MpR9ztCzVm7r8cTfV9h9FFEEiQ6AKD/) Wikipedia clone for ZeroNet with auto-import * [https://github.com/krixano/ Krixano] #vue.js * ZeroNet Dev Center * ZeroMedium [[Git Center repo]](/1BEPbMfV8QtaZCD2cPNbabfDKnmhTAZRPx) Medium for ZeroNet * ZeroExchage [[Git Center repo]](/17isV4gG9MmAwfcR6aroBN1nHmovrhodD4) StackExchange for ZeroNet. A place to ask questions and get answers. * ZeroFrame Router * ZeroDB [[Git Center repo]](/19t2vGe6Vmkou1rhJDjpsQoW8aCD2EWEFC/) Visual Editor for creating dbschema files for ZeroNet zite development. * Important Zites * NewImportantZites #cors The New and Improved Important Zites for ZeroNet. User-added zites, fast relevance-based searching with pagination, modern design. * grez911 * [https://github.com/grez911/poster poster] [[Git Center repo]](/173jgCe7oqQQAG8V4dNEDyHY4mFFWJKF1Q) A simple blog platform for ZeroNet written from scratch using Vue.js and Bulma. * Sorasumi Sayo (空澄砂夜) * [zero://1Ps8mZHcKGdwtjmMLBJ9b8KU6ogEBrjEig ZeroGreeter] #vue.js ZeroHello alternative (source code is also available [zero://presto.greeter.bit in the zite] folder) * [zero://1GdpMUiHj52rNburTfYwHP5qxBz6HPyvYy 0-Gallery] User fully controls her/his own gallery by creating personal hub. * [zero://15Z4H5K8YxjqGWpPxMLHWwr6Ve2nR7dz8d Sakana] Yet another ZeroMe frontend. The UI is similar to Mastodon. ===Other js frontend \& unconfirmed=== * [https://github.com/AnthyG/ AnthyG] * ThunderWave [[Git Center repo]](/1EjXEyudstY8dN3F8V5od9KoS1bkAerz9x/) #encryption A beautiful chat for ZeroNet with Image-Uploading, and private chat. * RMDZN\_Blog A beautiful Responsive Material-Design Blog for the ZeroNet * Thundote #encryption A beautiful note-taking app for ZeroNet. * Antilibrary * [https://github.com/antilibrary/Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI] [[Git Center repo]](/1ANuoPDX7RDKwEX6gFpVmu9kJWkmBkxWvc) #book-repo Front-End source code for the site Antilibrary.bit on ZeroNet * April93 (Kaffie) * [https://github.com/April93/Kaffiene Kaffiene] ZeroNet search engine * imachug (gitcenter) * [https://github.com/imachug/gitcenter gitcenter] [[Git Center repo ;D]](/18r929Hq8hE5Pi9Zf7ovMQVyn3WcGfxMgu/) [[Gitlab repo]](https://gitlab.com/imachug/gitcenter) * jlxip * [zero://1FZAVa7hak8pcVCvVSPz59z3f14CwSTN6H 0sh] ZeroShortener * [https://github.com/kopy-kate Kopy Kate] * Kopy Kate Online streaming torrents based on WebTorrent and ZeroNet * kopy-kate-big Video sharing platform for ZeroNet, using the Big Files feature! * [https://github.com/mkg20001 mkg2001] * ZeroNet-kivy #official #android #WIP * [zero://1F7b27kT38nMYZQg7tvDr33qWDZQgwnQpw/ mkg20001's Git(Hub) Mirror] a small Git(Hub) mirror, where mirrors the Git projects of some people/organizations * jaros1 (jro) * [https://github.com/jaros1/Money-Network Money-Network] Demo with complementary and alternative money. Implemented in ZeroNet and AngularJS. Focus on privacy, encryption, max data in client and min data on ZeroNet. Work in progress. * mcdev * [https://gitgud.io/mcdev/Millchan Millchan] [[Git Center repo]](/15qFg3C9mYTKEAQF678xczTPprbe7b6LMf) P2P imageboard engine for the ZeroNet network. * [https://github.com/rllola rllola] * zeroTube * mixtape #WIP new music site * unkn0wn * [zero://1P6tNJ97Hi1uUXjqpX3wJBUt4UFnAZojs6 Torrent Share] * [https://github.com/zer0net zer0net] * ZeroVoat #reddit-like * IFS Intergalactic File Server, archive.org alternative. ===Backend (python, etc.)=== * [https://github.com/imachug imachug] (gitcenter) * ZeroDevLib [[Git Center repo]](/198T84VCiznCMNBAnqTNEsRGRZW77nBPNo/) Libraries for ZeroNet * ZeroMailProxy [[Git Center repo by bornfree]](/1LnrtiTmBqYKrhorBxHsuiQLw8bKqjz5k7/) SMTP/POP3 protocol for ZeroMail * ThunderProxy A local IRC server supporting ThunderBird to send/recieve messages from ThunderWave chat (ZeroNet) * ZeroNet-cmd-lib Command-line tools for ZeroNet and some ZeroNet sites * [https://github.com/mkg20001 mkg2001] * ZeroNetJS #WIP A JS version of ZeroNet, using libp2p. * [https://github.com/MuxZeroNet MuxZeroNet] * ZeroMux Real time video transmuxing and streaming library designed for ZeroNet (Probably deprecated in favor of official big file support). * zerolib #WIP A Minimalist ZeroNet Protocol Library * [https://github.com/rllola rllola] * zeronet-torrent-plugin * nanos-zeronet-app #incomplete POC application that allow you to create and to sign your ZeroNet website updates using the Ledger Nano S. * liberit (Elspru) * [https://gitlab.com/liberit/zirch Zirch] #search-engine * [zero://1MnH9K7GnHpyhNwYRVMWAwkTmKfhQCpfvN EulerFinder] A ZeroNet search engine (with coinhive - clearnet coin-mining js)
